entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
